name: French Toast
instructions: Step 1. Whisk eggs, milk, vanilla, and sugar in a bowl.
Step 2. Soak bread slices in the mixture.
Step 3. Cook on a buttered pan until golden.
Step 4. Serve with syrup or powdered sugar.

name: Caesar Salad
instructions: Step 1. Chop lettuce and place in a bowl.
Step 2. Add dressing and lemon juice, then toss.
Step 3. Mix in Parmesan and croutons.
Step 4. Season with salt and pepper.

name: Chocolate Cake
instructions: Step 1. Preheat oven to 350°F and prepare pans.
Step 2. Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Step 3. Add milk, oil, and eggs. Mix well.
Step 4. Stir in boiling water and bake for 30 mins.

name: Veggie Stir-Fry
instructions: Step 1. Heat sesame oil in a wok.
Step 3. Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5 mins.
Step 4. Mix in soy sauce and serve.
